comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
Very hard to reproduce.  Usually does not happen.  I use this IDE 4 days a week and I have only had this problem twice.

More information:
I was using the undo feature of the editor in order to undo some text changes.  I believe that I may have saved before hitting undo.  I received this error message:

The operation "undo" did not complete normally.
See the log for further details.

java.lang.illegalState

I don't know where the log is.  Maybe I can provide more info if someone tells me where the log is.

Hi, 
yes the log can be very usefull, it is located under the workspace folder and the subfolder .metadata,
I also have this problem but it only happens about once every two weeks.  Next time it happens I'll post the log.

Here is the entire session in the log from when the error occured:

Hi there
Me too have the same problem, however, it happens when I'm deleting something.
I use build 20070826

The stack trace has something to do with projection.
It will be hard to reprocure, still since there are 3 different people we should investigate the problem.

(In reply to comment #5)
> The stack trace has something to do with projection.
> It will be hard to reprocure, still since there are 3 different people we
> should investigate the problem.

Opps, after hard work with PDT I have encountered the same problem.
Workaroung applied to PHPStructuredTextViewer's modelLine2WidgetLine() and getClosestWidgetLineForModelLine().
